name: OpenSource Technologies Inc.
description:
Over the last 10+ years, OpenSource Technologies (OST) has served Web and Mobile App services globally. We provide cost effective and innovative solutions to our clients. We have an in-house team of 75+ mobile app and web developers and designers.
OST Won “2019 Philadelphia 100® Entrepreneurs Winners” Award
We ensure that our solutions surpass your expectations. We believe in absolute transparency vis-à-vis  work in progress. We have proven track records in retail, high technology, manufacturing and social industries.
